info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 4:59PM MDT until May 23 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CURRY COUNTY... At 458 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rhea, or 13 miles west of Friona, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Texico, Bellview and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 396 and 397. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rains may flood intersections, ditches and underpasses. Do not attempt to drive through areas where water covers the roadway. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
